artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Yamato Shinbunsha; Carver: Noguchi Enkatsu
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: portrait of frowning man in rectangle in LRC, with brown lips, blue shading under jaw line and pink shading around eyes; man looks toward PR; man wears purple kimono with white geometric and leaf designs; grey ground; rectangular block of text at left with diagonal purple and red elements; red and green seals in URC and LLC
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳年 {Yoshitoshi} | Carver’s seal: 円活刀 {Enkatsu tō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Yamato Newspaper (Yamato Shinbun やまと新聞)
title: Abekawa kochi no adanami, no. 2
